attributes.background: Speaker Bercow stated his personal opposition to President Trump addressing Parliament accusing President Trump of racism and sexism .  In doing so Speaker Bercow seriously undermined the traditional impartiality of his role as speaker  and has made his position untenable.

rejection.details:
We're unsure what you would like Parliament to do. If you like, you could sign the petition below, which asks the House of Commons to debate a vote of no confidence in the Speaker:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183279
